testScenarios.testScenario: Processing a purchase order for a current customer

testCases.testCaseName: Process purchase order for an existing customer
testCases.purpose: To verify that the system correctly processes a purchase order for an existing customer
testCases.preConditions: A purchase order has been received and the customer exists in the system

steps.description: Check if the customer is a current customer
steps.expectedResult: System identifies the customer as a current customer
steps.testData: Customer ID from the purchase order

testScenarios.testScenario: Processing a purchase order for a new US customer

testCases.testCaseName: Process a purchase order for a new US customer
testCases.purpose: To verify that the system correctly processes a purchase order for a new customer from the US
testCases.preConditions: The system is operational and accessible. The user has the necessary permissions to process orders.

steps.expectedResult: The system acknowledges the receipt of the purchase order
